AbsMax.description: Absolute maximum magnitude observed within the event time-series.

AbsValue.description: Absolute value of the 2d_po timeseries result (ignoring sign).

SignedAbsMax.description: Absolute maximum magnitude preserving the original sign (positive/negative).

Max.description: Maximum value in the event window.

Min.description: Minimum value in the event window.

Area_Culv.description: Full cross-sectional area of the culvert barrel reported by ccA outputs.

Area_Max.description: Maximum wetted area recorded for the culvert during the event (ccA output).

Tmax.description: Time (hours) at which the maximum value occurs.

Tmin.description: Time (hours) at which the minimum value occurs.

Location.description: Model result location identifier from the 2d_po file.

ID.description: Reporting Location Line identifier from the RLL outputs.

Location ID.description: Normalized location identifier used when grouping maximums across different source types.

Time.description: Simulation time (hours) corresponding to the recorded statistic.

Q.description: Discharge/flow rate reported for the location.

Type.description: 2d_po quantity type (for example Flow, Water Level, Velocity).

DS_h.description: Downstream water level extracted from maximum-result CSVs (usually metres AHD).

US_h.description: Upstream water level extracted from maximum-result CSVs (usually metres AHD).

DS_H.description: Downstream water level taken from the 1d_H timeseries output.

US_H.description: Upstream water level taken from the 1d_H timeseries output.

US Invert.description: Invert elevation at the upstream end of the culvert/channel.

DS Invert.description: Invert elevation at the downstream end of the culvert/channel.

US Obvert.description: Crown/obvert elevation at the upstream end of the culvert/channel.

Height.description: Barrel height or diameter used for the culvert/channel definition.

num_barrels.description: Estimated number of circular barrels derived from Area_Culv (1d_ccA_) and Height for C-type culverts.

Length.description: Culvert or channel length taken from the 1d_Chan file.

n or Cd.description: Manning's n roughness (for open channels) or discharge coefficient (for culverts).

pBlockage.description: Blockage percentage applied to the culvert/barrel.

Flags.description: Source flags describing channel or culvert configuration issues.

H.description: Water level reported for the location at the time of the maximum flow event.

dQ.description: Differential flow reported by the RLL maximum output.

Time dQ.description: Time associated with the differential flow reported by the RLL output.

aep_text.description: Annual exceedance probability label parsed from the run code (e.g. '01p').

aep_numeric.description: Annual exceedance probability represented as a numeric percentage e.g 1.

duration_text.description: Storm duration label parsed from the run code (e.g. '00030m').

duration_numeric.description: Storm duration represented as a numeric value (mins - tuflow style).

tp_text.description: Temporal pattern identifier parsed from the run code. e.g. TP07

tp_numeric.description: Temporal pattern identifier represented as a numeric value. e.g. 1

trim_runcode.description: Run code without the AEP, TP and Duration component. Used to group comparable scenarios.

internalName.description: Full run code derived from the source file name.

file.description: Name of the source CSV file that contributed the row.

path.description: Absolute path to the source CSV file.

rel_path.description: Source CSV path relative to the working directory when processing.

directory_path.description: Absolute directory containing the source CSV file.

rel_directory.description: Directory containing the source CSV file relative to the working directory.

R01.description: First segment of the run code.

R02.description: Second segment of the run code.

R03.description: Third segment of the run code.

R04.description: Fourth segment of the run code.

R05.description: Fifth segment of the run code.

Value.description: Raw 2d_po metric captured at the reporting location.

pFull_Max.description: Maximum percent full reported by ccA.

pTime_Full.description: Time (hours) at which ccA reports the culvert as maximum percent full.

Dur_Full.description: Duration (hours) the culvert remained full according to ccA.

Dur_10pFull.description: Duration (hours) the culvert remained above 10 percent full (ccA output).

Sur_CD.description: Surcharge coefficient/depth reported by ccA when the culvert is surcharged.

Dur_Sur.description: Duration (hours) the culvert experienced surcharge conditions.

pTime_Sur.description: Time (hours) at which the surcharge condition peaked.

TFirst_Sur.description: Time (hours) when the surcharge condition first began.

MedianAbsMax.description: Absolute maxima across median of temporal patterns for the group.

median_TP.description: Temporal pattern associated with the MedianAbsMax.

mean_including_zeroes.description: Mean of the statistic including zero values within the group.

mean_excluding_zeroes.description: Mean of the statistic excluding zero values within the group.

mean_PeakFlow.description: Peak flow from the event whose statistic is nearest to the group's arithmetic mean; not an averaged peak flow. Uses mean_including_zeroes.

mean_Duration.description: Duration taken from the same nearest-to-mean event used for mean_PeakFlow.

mean_TP.description: Temporal pattern taken from the same nearest-to-mean event used for mean_PeakFlow.

mean_Q.description: Arithmetic mean discharge for the grouped culvert results.

mean_V.description: Arithmetic mean velocity for the grouped culvert results.

mean_DS_h.description: Arithmetic mean downstream water level for the grouped culvert results.

mean_US_h.description: Arithmetic mean upstream water level for the grouped culvert results.

low.description: Minimum statistic encountered across all temporal patterns in the group.

high.description: Maximum statistic encountered across all temporal patterns in the group.

count_TP.description: Events (TPs) in this AEP-duration bin that contributed to the per-duration statistic.

count_TP_aep.description: Sum of contributing events across all durations for this AEP/Location/Type/run.

count_duration.description: Number of duration bins considered for the AEP/Location/Type/run statistic.

mean_storm_is_median_storm.description: Deprecated. Don't use. Indicates whether the mean storm matches the median storm selection.

min_Q.description: Minimum discharge observed across the grouped culvert events.

min_V.description: Minimum velocity observed across the grouped culvert events.

min_DS_h.description: Minimum downstream water level observed across the grouped culvert events.

min_US_h.description: Minimum upstream water level observed across the grouped culvert events.

max_Q.description: Maximum discharge observed across the grouped culvert events.

max_V.description: Maximum velocity observed across the grouped culvert events.

max_DS_h.description: Maximum downstream water level observed across the grouped culvert events.

max_US_h.description: Maximum upstream water level observed across the grouped culvert events.

adopted_Q.description: Discharge from the event whose Q value is closest to the sample mean for the group; used as the adopted representative flow.

adopted_V.description: Velocity from the adopted event associated with the adopted_Q selection.

adopted_DS_h.description: Downstream water level from the adopted event associated with the adopted_Q selection.

adopted_US_h.description: Upstream water level from the adopted event associated with the adopted_Q selection.

MedianAbsMax.description: Medians for the specific AEP/Duration/Location/Type/run grouping.
Medians the maximum median per AEP/Location/Type/run grouping.
